content.rendered:
Logistics Partner Registration form

Shypr operates as an on-demand shipping application, allowing users to request couriers to deliver items in a fast and efficient manner without having to leave their office or home.

Logistics Partner Registration form

    Logistics Partner Registration Form

    sing up our newsletter

    Sign up today for hints, tips and the latest product news - plus exclusive special offers.

    Subscription Form

excerpt.rendered: Logistics Partner Registration form Shypr operates as an on-demand shipping application, allowing users to request couriers to deliver items in a fast and efficient manner without having to leave their office or home. Logistics Partner Registration form Carrier / Courier Name Business Address Address 2 City State Zip Code Email Phone / Mobile Contact’s Name Last Name Fleet Size Coverage Areas (City, County, State?) Freight Transport? YesNo If yes, what type of trailer(s)? —Please choose an option—FlatbedDry VanReeferDrop/Step DeckOther How did you hear about us? —Please choose an option—FacebookGoogleTwitterInstagramYelpYoutubeTelegramOther Have any questions or concerns? I acknowledge that I have read and consented to Shypr Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy and processing of my personal data for communication purposes, according to them, GDPR, and relevant local legislation, as well as to receive email correspondence or phone calls from Shypr.
